name: Ankylosaurus
description: The Ankylosaurus is a massive beast characterized by its heavy armor, with a notable tail used for attacks.
memorable: Its ability to knock opponents prone with its tail attack makes the Ankylosaurus a formidable presence in combat.
goals: Often serves to protect its territory or seek food, depending on its environment.
relations: May be encountered in the company of other prehistoric creatures or within wild, untamed lands.
environment: Usually found in prehistoric or jungle-like environments.
strengths: High armor class and hit points make it a durable creature in combat, excelling in physical confrontations.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit its abilities outside of physical combat, and it has a slower movement speed compared to other creatures.
attacks: Relies on a powerful tail attack that deals significant bludgeoning damage and can knock targets prone.
most_powerful_ability: Tail attack, which can deal substantial damage and potentially knock targets prone.
senses: Has a passive perception of 11, indicating average perception ability.
additional_information: High strength and constitution scores provide exceptional physical power.
Remarkably durable, making it a tough opponent to defeat.
Tail attack has a reach of 10 feet, allowing it to strike targets from a distance.
Challenge rating of 3 indicates a moderate threat to adventurers.
With no ability in strategy or tactics, it focuses purely on physical confrontations.
